Module com.pizza_group.project4
Package com.pizza_group.project4

Class StoreOrdersController

java.lang.Object
com.pizza_group.project4.StoreOrdersController
public class StoreOrdersController extends Object
StoreOrdersController controls the view of StoreOrder by allowing capabilities to cancel a store order, export a store order, and browse through all orders in store order. Also, displays order total including tax.
Author:
Alexis Wilson, James Alba

    Sets main controller object to the current store order controller and sets combo box containing all order number and related order information.

    Private helper method that displays whether the export of store order was successful or not.
